name: Kingdoms CCG
summary:
Gods Reborn has arrived. 97 all-new cards that enhance old strategies, create all-new deck types and provide answers to some of the most powerful decks in the game.

The intense battle between Elara and T'rror has not gone unnoticed beyond the shores of Euna. New races - Cat People, Naga, Trolls - have found their way to Euna from beyond the horizon and brought their forgotten powers to the battlefield.
